channel.description: Recent content in corruption on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Our part in world violence (Tibet)
item.description: From May 11, 2008 Violence and aggression rise from fear and greed. What gives the Chinese the right to violate human rights? To kill and torture people?

item.title: As an 'Equalist'
item.description: First published on August 12, 2007 during my BSc in Bangalore. Before the first tests this year, there was a lecture on three consecutive days for the girl students of all three years of degree in the Multi-Purpose hall.
